word_mean: 产出性的，产生性的：生产或形成
特指能产生新组织的炎症或能咳出痰或粘液的咳嗽

sentence.Network_en: More productive farmers have been able to provide cheaper food.
sentence.Network_cn: 农民提高产量就能使食物更加便宜。

sentence.Network_en: It is counter-productive to address an interviewee in patronizing tones.
sentence.Network_cn: 以盛气凌人的语气同面试者讲话将会适得其反。

sentence.Network_en: Land, labor and capital are all productive of wealth.
sentence.Network_cn: 土地、劳动和资本都能创造财富。

policy to guide productive service industry in developed countries and its enlightenment ., 发达国家生产性服务业的政策导向及启示.

list.abs: ◆ 广义产品(Generalized Product)，使用的是基于ISO9000:2000《质量管理系统————基础和术语》(Quality Management System Standards —— Fundamentals and vocabulary)3.4.1“过程(process)“定义和2.4.2“产品(product)“定义的哲理级抽象概念：一组将输入转化为输出的相互关联或相互作用的活动的结果.一些典型的广义产品实例.
广西华美纸业集团有限公司 ... 走进华美 ABOUT US 产品展示 PRODUCTS 华美新闻 NEWS.
制字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 制冷〖 refrigeration〗 制品〖 goods;products〗 制售〖 makeandsell〗.
项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Product User 产品用户 Production 生产 Production Capacity 生产能力.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... productive a 生产的；多产的 productivity n 生产力，生产活动 reduce v 降低，减少.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French productif, -ive or late Latin productivus, from product- 'brought forth', from the verb producere (see produce)

entry.def: Someone or something that is productive produces or does a lot for the amount of resources used.

example.tran: 培训提高了工人们的生产力。

example.ex: More productive farmers have been able to provide cheaper food.
example.tran: 农民提高产量就能使食物更加便宜。

entry.def: If you say that a relationship between people is productive, you mean that a lot of good or useful things happen as a result of it.

example.ex: He was hopeful that the next round of talks would also be productive...
example.tran: 他对下一轮会谈同样富有成效满怀希望。

example.ex: I was sorry he had left, although I soon developed a productive relationship with his successors.
example.tran: 虽然我很快就和他的继任者建立了良好的关系，但是我仍然对他的离开感到遗憾。

entry.def: Something that is productive of a situation or feeling creates it.

example.ex: Land, labor and capital are all productive of wealth.
example.tran: 土地、劳动和资本都能创造财富。

means.word_mean: 1. producing or capable of producing (especially abundantly);
2. having the ability to produce or originate;

auth_sentence.content: It is not a very productive way of saving.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is not a very productive way of saving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is not a very productive way of saving.

auth_sentence.content: It is highly productive, even during low winds.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is highly productive, even during low winds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is highly productive, even during low winds.

auth_sentence.content: China said this week new sanctions may be counter-productive.
auth_sentence.res_content: China said this week new sanctions may be counter-productive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: China said this week new sanctions may be counter-productive.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易拉长的,易变形的,可塑的
stems_affixes.word_buile: duct引导,带来+ile能……的→能引导的→可塑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ive……的→adj.生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
via路+duct引导,带来→引导路的路
con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体
stems_affixes.word_buile: conduct引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导+or人或物器→n.管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
stems_affixes.word_buile: educt=educe[v.引出;演绎]+ion表名词→n.引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ivity表名词→n.生产率
seduct=seduce[v.勾引,诱惑]+ion动作或状态→n.诱惑
vent风,通风+i+duct引导,带来→引导通风

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥
in进入+duct引导,带来→引进→引导

Sentence.sentence: In a paper published recently, Kapur applied the principle of productive failure to mathematical problem solving in three schools.
So we need to "design for productive failure" by building it into the learning process

To classify parenting as a personal choice for which there is no collective responsibility is not merely to ignore the social benefits of good parenting; really, it is to steal those benefits because they accrue (不断积累) to the whole of society as today's children become tomorrow's productive citizenry (公民).

sentences.en: They lived on the produc -tive land.
sentences.cn: 他们生活在富饶的土地上。

means.word_mean: 富有成效的; 有益的

sentences.en: We had a productive meeting that solved some problems.
sentences.cn: 我们开了一个富有成效的会议, 解决了一些问题。

means.word_mean: 具有创造性的，有创意的

jushi.english: She is a very productive writer.
We had a productive meeting that solved some problems.
jushi.chinese: 我们开了一个富有成效的会议，解决了一些问题。
